headline: Anthem Blue Cross Blue Shield reverses course on controversial anesthesia policy after widespread backlash
summary: The abrupt change comes amid broader discussions of bad behavior by insurance companies in the wake of the fatal shooting of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson.

raw.headline: Anthem Blue Cross Blue Shield reverses course on controversial anesthesia policy after widespread backlash

headline: Anthem Blue Cross Blue Shield reverses decision to put a time limit on anesthesia
summary: One of the country’s largest health insurers reversed a change in policy Thursday after widespread outcry, saying it would not tie payments in some states to the length of time a patient went under...
